title: TripAdvisor API/Scrapper input
description: To unleashed the full power of the scrapper/API use the options bellow!

locationFullName.title: Location
locationFullName.description: Location name as you would enter to TripAdvisor search. Actor takes the first result as desired location

lastReviewDate.title: Reviews since date (YYYY-MM-DD)
lastReviewDate.description: It is a date where the scrapper stops loading older reviews

includeRestaurants.title: Include restaurants
includeRestaurants.description: If checked results includes restaurants for given location.

includeAttractions.title: Include things to do [BETA]
includeAttractions.description: If checked results includes hotels for given location.

includeHotels.title: Include Hotels
includeHotels.description: If checked results includes hotels for given location.

includeReviews.title: Include reviews
includeReviews.description: If checked results includes reviews data

checkInDate.title: Check in date (YYYY-MM-DD)
checkInDate.description: Hotel rooms prices will be calculated for this date
